column4: i have a problem with my hard disk. i did something wrong with Gparted and it has something to do with gpt/mbr partitioning tables (i think) and also with the ext4
anyone care to help?
i messed up somewhere along the way with gparted and the problem is that i can only see a PART of my drive, 30gbs, when my drive is 120 gbs
anyone has any idea ?
what did u do exactly
i messed up my harddisk and now i can't see the whole disk, except in the livcd of jaunty
i don't know i did a couple of things many times
i did have ext4 partitions and i erased them with parted magic
parted magc? then?
Nan0fire:during live session are u able to see ur whole hdd?

i saw only a part of my drive there, not the whole thing (i think because parted magic couldnt percieve the ext4) so i tried to do something new and used on the part i could see the gpt partitioning table
in the livecd sessions of jjaunty yes, in parted magic, i only see what i see in windows (half of my disk!)
do you understand the prob or should i tell more?
any ideas?
use fdisk ..
i tried already
what do u see
i see all i guess.. i deleted all partitions with it, and i made a new ntfs with it ( with help of an irc buddy)
Nan0fire:u can recover the partition table ..if it hasnt lost already...
i erased, repartition-tabled, partitoined everyting a couple of times so i don't think there's a way back :S
no
